name: Morgue Agony (VR)
description:
Description

Trapped in a morgue find your way out solving riddles provided by an unknown man.

Controls

SteamVR Input actions:

GrabPinch/GrabGrip for Grab, Pick up, Throw

Teleport for teleporting

Microphone (HMD built-in) for speaking

Developers

Giorgos Kletsas

Dimitris Dallas

Rate and comment for feedback.

This game was created in Monthly VR Game Jam | Sponsored By VR/AR Association Philly in 9 days.
